title: Embodied Cognition-Based Computational Thinking Mathematics Experience Program

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Experiential workshops conducted by university students as part of educational volunteer programs for elementary school students

learning_goals: Students must improve pattern recognition in math problems by ≥80% through physical activities.
Learners must implement and present abstract math concepts as algorithmic steps in VR simulations.
Demonstrate embodied cognitive application skills of ≥3/4 points on experiential activity rubrics.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
